    • getElementFromMatchAtPosition

      public static org.hamcrest.Matcher<android.view.View> getElementFromMatchAtPosition(org.hamcrest.Matcher<android.view.View> matcher, int position)
      This Matcher helps us to perform actions on Views in RecyclerViews that we don't have another way of accessing. It was originally needed to perform click operations on checkboxes in a RecyclerView. https://stackoverflow.com/a/43552179/255217
